query:
SELECT
                n.id,
                n.staff_pm_message_id,
                n.staff_pm_id,
                sp.subject AS staff_pm_subject,
                n.created_at,
                n.read_status
            FROM notifications_staff_pm_messages n
            JOIN staff_pms sp ON sp.id = n.staff_pm_id
            WHERE n.user_id = $1
            AND ($2::bool = TRUE OR n.read_status = FALSE)
            ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
